choices: Use it like a flesh light
1.content:
You were hired as an unpaid intern in the midst of shooting the film "The Shallow". Your boss told you to basically serve as a personal assistant to anything Blake Lively asked of you.

This was your first gig as being a p.a. so you hoped things would run smoothly especially considering who you're supposed to be serving.

Your boss tells you Blake is in her dressing room and she needs something of you. You rush over to keep her from waiting. There you stood, the steel door the only thing keeping you from someone like her.

You knock and you hear a come in. Opening the door, a blonde goddess is resting on a couch with her barefeet propped up on the table. She was rubbing her soles against one another and interlocking her toes. You couldn't help but stare. This was short lived as you heard her clear her throat. She gave a grin and asked your name.

After some introductions were made, she asked you to fetch her Birkenstocks from wardrobe since she'll be needing for the next scene.

You scurry off to wardrobe and acquire the shoes. When you get them, the worn and dirt covered look to them had you curious. Thoughts ran wild in your head. Should you taste them? Would she notice? How long before she thinks I've been gone too long.
1.title: The Lucky Intern

11.content:
Your thoughts got the best of you and you darted for the closest bathroom. You hop into a stall, lock the door, and gaze at whats in the palm of your hands. Blake Lively's very worn and dirty shoes.

You were salivating so you took long licks where the sole of her foot would be. Then you sniffed the toe region and you got intoxicated off the smell. You didn't realize how long you had been gone and mildly panicked. You rush towards the trailer and swing the door open.

Blake still in the same position as when you left, looked ticked off. She questioned why it took so long for you get the shoes and you fumbled trying to explain yourself.

"Well bring it over here, I didn't ask you to get it just for you to hold onto it"

You place it down close to her and she thanks you. You ask what else you can do for her and she says nothing for now and to just camp out in the corner over there.

Another 5 minutes pass and Blake looks down at her shoes. Something catches her eye and she picks up the shoe. They were mildly damp and not as dirty as she remembers to be.

"Hey over there, umm can you explain something to me. So why are these cleaner and damper than when I last used them"

This left a wave of terror over your body, you were thinking of how to respond.
11.title: Clean her shoes

112.content:
You couldn't summon the courage to tell the truth and came up with the halfass excuse that you spilled water on them.

Blake said nothing and just stared straight into your eyes. This made you uncomfortable and you tried to clear the tension by offering to get her coffee or anything else to just leave.

She smiles and laughs.

"Come here doofus, kneel next to me"

You obey her command and kneel in front of her. She extends her hand out and pats your head, then she ran her fingers through your hair. These sensations felt great because it was her touching you. Suddenly she grabs your face and raises you to eye level.

"That was adorable, I mean really... you got water on them. So this water just happens to smell like saliva, I see dirt on your tongue, and you were gone 30 mins just mucking about instead of drying them. Sure okay" She lightly slaps your face.

She reaches down and retrieves one of her shoes. She grabs the back of your head and brings it into her shoe.

"Don't deny what you did, I like when people can be honest about what they do. I might have to find someone new if you can't change. Now do what you were doing to this shoe earlier... lets see what you got"

You figured what the hell, you didn't hold back. Licking down the big shoe, you gave it a grade A cleaning.

Blake clearly didn't want to hold this position for any longer so she got into a more comfortable position.

She hooked the back of your head with one foot and with the other she used it to hold the shoe against your face. She wiped her shoe all over your face, transferring the dirt from there to your face. This was bliss for you but it would get better.

She removed the shoe, and held the bare sole of her foot just inches away from your face. Like a dog, you were practically drooling for your treat.

Your face soon met the most amazing feet in the world but before you could do anything she had pinched your nose with her toes and told you to look at her.

"Listen buddy, don't forget we're on lunch break okay, we don't have all day to do this. I'll allow you to worship but afterwards get me some lunch okay... so dig in"

You lick away and plant as many kisses as you could muster. Soon after her sole was looking clean so she switched feet and you got to work. Long licks up and down the soles and you sucked her toes to really remove any dirt stains on her. She moved both soles onto your face and you took a big inhale.

"Hey I'm starving, so go get me something to eat okay. My feet will be here either way"

You leave the trailer and look for food to get her.
112.title: Deny deny deny

choices: I'll be back they need to shoot next scene
1121.content:
Off to the mess hall you went, thinking hard about what'd she want to eat. You grab her some sushi and a drink then back to her trailer for some feet.

You come back into the trailer and she thanks god that food is here.

"Now come lay down in front of me, I'm gonna need a footstool to enjoy my lunch"

You come in front and lay your head in between her feet. You love big feet so when she raised both soles up onto your face, it was heaven. She was tap dancing on your face, somewhat grinding her soft soles into your skin. Her feet enveloped your entire face, her toes extended past your chin.

Then she acted as if your face was a doormat, she wiped her feet all over your face as she sat above you eating her sushi. She tapped your face and you opened your mouth to allow her toes to enter. You didn't expect her to stick all ten in your mouth and you couldn't help but gag.

She laughed from above and this humiliation and control excited you. She moved one foot to your nipple and gave it a big squeeze, meanwhile you licked her other foot. 1121.title: Get her lunch and return

11212.content:
"Okay one last kiss, I have to shoot some more scenes. Go to wardrobe and tell them you need as many shoes of mine as possible, your job is to clean them with your tongue. Figured you outta be productive when you're not lapping away at my feet. Also we'll deal with that woody of yours later okay" she slaps your face a bit with her sole and you thank her with more kisses.

You're still in disbelief that you get to clean her feet as well as her shoes. An immense privilege just to be her assistant but with the way she's treating you, you wouldn't trade it for anything.

Back to storage you went and they were confused why you only came there for her shoes but they didn't press too hard into the matter. If the boss heard that they displeased Blake, then they'd all be out of work.

An array of shoes had to be put in a container for you to transport. Her shoes ranged from flip flops to high heels and everything in between. You spent little time gawking and more time cleaning.

An idea popped into your head... you knew she'd be busy shooting for the rest of the day so she wouldn't know if you jerked off while smelling her shoes. You grab some dirty flip flops and begin enjoying yourself. You licked and sniffed, triggering you to stroke harder and faster.

It was euphoric and your brain was going hay wire.
11212.title: I'll be back they need to shoot next scene
